transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello? Yes.
Customer: Sir, called you regarding IndiaMART.
Executive: Haan, boliye.
Customer: Sir, aaj discuss suno na tha na aapke IndiaMART ke regarding.
Executive: Haan, haan, haan, boliye.
Customer: So we were supposed to come online.
Executive: Sir, isiliye call kiya tha.
Customer: Okay, actually ek side work chal raha hai, ek project ke regarding. To usko postpone kar sakte ho? Kyunki hamara work chal raha hai aur main usse online nahi ho paunga.
Executive: Kar lete hai sir, jo bhi. Accha, accha, nahi sir, aap time de do, usi time aapko ring kar le sir, agar abhi aap vyast hai to.
Customer: Ah, kal ka rakho madam, kal, kal subah tak.
Executive: Sir, aaj 5-10 minute le lete, kafi hota.
Customer: Ah, solution kya kiya hai? Mere ko itna batao, chalo main verbally discuss kar leta hu. Aapne solution ke liye kya karega? Mere ko solution se matlab hai.
Executive: Hum aapko ye baat batana chahte hain ki hum aur bhi best matlab lead kaise find kar sakte hain. Like manually also we can do that. To aur bhi hum keyword aapko display kar dete hain. Agar aapko suitable laga to you can put on your profile. Kyunki wo to humne form bhi bhara tha but nahi ho paya tha sir is vajah se. Aapne customize word dalne ke liye bola tha na.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Wo cheez hai. To use agar usi ke liye to main isi time se wo main insist kar raha tha par wo uska solution nahi ho raha hai to fir meeting karke matlab nahi hai. Isi ke liye main Satyam jo abhi hamare jo management matlab aapke India team se jo bhi hai manager hai jo bhi hai. Satyam karke hai koi banda. Unse bhi call kiya tha. Unhone humne wahi insist kiya tha agar uska solution hota hai to hi hum log aage discuss karenge. Warna hum log iska kuch solution dusra nikalne ka soch rahe hain. Kyunki uske starting se hi agar bataya hota ke aapka platform pe naya words add nahi hoga. To hum pehle se isko dhyan mein rakh ke karte. Kyunki hamara work hi aisa hai customize work hai aur customize work ke hisab se hamara jo keyword hai traffic shuruwat mein to nahi rahega. Par hamara product launch karne ke liye wo jaruri hai aur standard product to sab banate hain. Hamara prior yahi hai ke wo jo customize mold hai hamara wo core hai business. To usi ka solution nahi hoga to fir discuss.
Executive: Sir, pehle baat hua tha to aapne bola tha ki lead aise bhi generic bhi aap consume karke unhe convince kar lenge aap bataye the na sir. To us basis pe aapka matlab tha ki ho jayega sir. To usme possible nahi hai sir ki matlab general lead pe bhi aap convince kar sake.
Customer: General lead to hai par general mein bhi kya hota hai wo to concrete ka product ka lead aata hai abhi bhi. General mein bhi product mold ka aana chahiye na general chalo main bhi samajhta hu chalo platform par hai standard product bhi banate hain ek time main bhi chalo theek hai kuch na kuch keyword kar lunga dusre product ke liye par usme bhi concrete ka lead aa raha hai to fir discussion karke matlab nahi hai na madam. Aap samajh rahe ho agar hamara mold mold ka kam hai customize kam kar rahe ho customize mein aapka team bol raha hai ke lead nahi aayega. Chalo theek hai standard product hai standard product mein lead aapne dal diya aapke design team ne bhi jo bhi hai suggestion kiya uske hisab se sab dal diya information humne dal diya. To uske hisab se bhi abhi bhi lead concrete ka aa raha hai to fir solution kya hua? Aap fir meeting karoge fir wohi.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Agar ye dono solution nahi aate to.
Executive: Boliye, haan boliye, boliye kya bol rahe ho?
Executive: Sir, jaise box convert hai iska bhi by lead hum pe traffic mein jo bhi lead aa raha hai aap us pe ek bar aap dobara se agar aap try karo to usko aap apne taraf se mold karo to wo cheez bhi possible hai sir. Kyunki aise hi customer hota hai sir banta hai sir.
Customer: Humko problem nahi hai par aap mold ke regarding lead aayega to hi hamara kam ka hai. Chahe standard ho aur customize karo to sabse badhiya hai kyunki wo hamara core requirement hai. Hamara kam hi yahi hai. Agar koi naya vendor aata hai IndiaMART ke platform pe to uska product to naya hi rahega kyunki uniqueness wo layega to hi uska dhandha chalu hoga aur aapka platform bolta hai ke uniqueness nahi hoga traffic nahi hoga hamara product ye nahi chalega to standard bana ke matlab kya standard to 10-15 vendor bana rahe hain. Mera question ye hai. Agar standard hi banana hota hai hamara kam.
Customer: Haan, hamara kam mold hai standard to sab banate hain 15 vendor banate hain 15 nahi 20 ho gaye. Par hamara unique word hai matlab difference jo humne bataya tha jo aapko insist kiya tha do teen mold ka usme se panch se aapne form fill up karke aapki team ne kiya tha wo usme bhi wo bhi clear nahi hua. To fir hamare liye wo platform matlab wo is nahi hai solution nahi hai wohi bol raha hu. Aur usme bhi aapka team ne bola tha.
Executive: By lead mein manually type karke search kare jaise humne upar lead diya haan.
Customer: Kya manually?
Executive: Sir, jaise aap by lead ko na manually bhi search kar sakte hain jaise aap mold word dal dijiye. Hai na to aap type karke lead customer nikal lijiye aise bhi hota hai sir wo aapne ek bar inculcate kiya sir?
Customer: Manually maine try nahi kiya hai jo samne se lead aata hai aapke team ki taraf se. Jo aapke taraf se jo lead aata hai.
Executive: Ek bar kar lo sir manually.
Customer: To manually mein bhi jo aapke taraf se jo lead generate hota hai ya customize product ka hai par wo keyword hi match nahi hota hai. Abhi you drain hum char type ke alag alag banate hain for example general discussion kar raha hu. Jo L type hai corner drain hai sab alag alag hum log drain develop kar rahe hain aapke keyword mein khali drain mold aa raha hai. To drain mold mein koi specification hai hi nahi to usme humne general dal diya hai to drain mold to sab banate hain panch che vendor hai to hamara diversification nahi milta hai unko hamara jo core business hai uske liye.
Executive: Sir, jaise maine search bar mein dala you drain mold matlab upar jahan pe search karne ka hota hai to mujhe you drain mold mein Ahmedabad ke bhi lead dikha raha hai aur ke bhi dikha raha hai to aise karke agar hum kare to chalega sir. Ek bar online aa jate hain isme bhi dekh lete hain.
Customer: Ah, ek kam karo abhi to possible nahi hai madam warna main aapko time de deta. Kyunki mera ek design work chal raha hai aur uske discussion chal raha hai to client ko main mana nahi kar sakta. Ah, main kal subah 100% aapke abhi bhi time de deta hu 10 se 11 ke beech mein main aapke liye aadha ghanta ya 15 minute nikal lenge hum log ek lenge uska solution aata hai to.
Executive: Ek bar sir manually aap aaj waqt mile to jarur aap kariega try. Theek hai baki kal to hum mil hi rahe hain 10 baje main aapko call karti hu online mil rahe hain online milenge fir hum Google meet ke through online milke baat karte hain theek hai.
Customer: Okay, aapka aap kaun bol rahe ho?
Executive: Main Shubham ki manager baat kar rahi hu.
Customer: Okay, Preeti madam aapke account manager hai na haan Deepika.
Executive: Haan haan.
Customer: Okay, okay, koi dikkat nahi hai.
Executive: Kal 10 baje main dal dungi na calendar aapka Google meet ka.
Customer: Wo main expect karta hu solution aayega to hi meeting karenge theek hai aap jo bhi hai aapke team se management team se jo bhi discussion karna hai kar lena prior. Kyunki main ye meeting kar kar ke thak gaya hu.
Executive: Try kar lete hain sir baki ek bar aur mauka de dijiye sir isiliye hum milke ek hi purpose ke liye mile hain hai na to wo cheeze agar ho paati hai to aapke liye bhi betterment hai hamare liye bhi hai na to ek bar try kar lete hain theek hai.
Customer: Theek hai, okay, okay.
Executive: Theek hai. Theek hai. Okay, thank you. Kal ka done hai na sir?
Customer: 10 se 11 ke beech mein rakhna kyunki hum log 11 baje tak factory pohchte hain to 10 se 11 baje tak rakhna beech mein. Late pe late 11:15, 11 se 11 se 11:15 baje se pehle to hum log khatam kar lenge.
Executive: Haan haan, fir chalega sir chalega.
Customer: Okay, okay, ji, ji.
Executive: Aaj full possibility nahi hai sir thodi si bhi.
Customer: Ah, hota hai to main samne se call karunga difficult hai kyunki main side par hu aur uska work khatam karna padega discussion stream mein chal raha hai isiliye.
Executive: Theek hai. Theek hai.
Customer: Okay, okay, okay, okay, okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer needs a solution for keyword matching.

- Customer is receiving concrete product leads.

- Customer wants customized mold leads.

- Customer is tired of attending meetings without solutions.



Resolution:

- Executive suggested manually searching for leads.

- Executive offered a Google Meet to discuss solutions.

- Meeting scheduled for the next day between 10-11 AM.



Next Steps: 

- Executive to try manually searching for leads.

- Customer to attend Google Meet for further discussion.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, keywords, customized molds, google meet
